text: The Red Jews () refers to the medieval claim of a mythical Jewish nation seeking to destroy Christianity. The claim appeared in German folklore between the 13th and 15th century. ==Related pages== * Antisemitism * The Holocaust * Anti-Judaism and antisemitism * Accusations of Jewish anti-Christianity ==References== Category:Racism Category:Mythology Category:Middle Ages Category:Christianity Category:Antisemitism Category:Discrimination Category:Disinformation Category:History of Germany Category:Conspiracy theories Category:Antisemitism in Europe Category:Antisemitism in Germany
